alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 11:30PM CDT until July 13 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Bourbon County in southeastern Kansas... Northeastern Crawford County in southeastern Kansas... Northwestern Barton County in southwestern Missouri... Southern Vernon County in west central Missouri... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1130 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fort Scott, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Prairie State Park, Fort Scott, Liberal, Sheldon, Mulberry, Arcadia, Bronaugh, Moundville, Milo, Deerfield, Burgess, Oskaloosa, Pawnee Station, Verdella, Garland and Hannon. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 76 and 87. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
